title: leaverbuster
body: So i was in game and my power went out.......and i got banned for 20 minutes for 5 games......this is not my fault i dident leave or anything.......so i dont think i should be punished because of something the weather did and i cant do anything about it

replies.body:
LeaverBuster does not issue punishments for one leave - particularly the 20 minute penalty. In order to receive the 20 minute penalty, you need to accumulate a number of leaves.

[Don’t be a leaver. Don’t get busted.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

i know that......and other games i dident leave my internet was messing up and it disconnected me..but if i dident leave and my power went out i should have no rreason to be banned

Leaverbuster treats all leaves equally regardless of intent, because it still causes everyone else a negative experience.  The only way to remove a lwoer priority queue is to play without interruptions.  I recommend going over our [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) guide for more details on how that system works.  Best of luck!

That leave would have been the trigger due to your past leaves. While this leave isn't your fault, it stacked on your past leaves and reached enough leaves to activate the punishment. 

You mentioned you were experiencing connectivity issues, you should refrain from playing any match-made games until you are confident that your connectivity issues are solved. If you're unsure how to solve them - contact us and we'll be happy to assist.
